abundance-table-rank.title: Abundance table with counts per taxa
abundance-table-rank.description: Per-taxa counts TSV, including all samples.

bracken-report.title: Bracken report file
bracken-report.description: TSV file with the abundance of each taxa. More info about [bracken report](https://github.com/jenniferlu717/Bracken#output-kraken-style-bracken-report).

kraken-report.title: Kraken2 taxonomic assignment per read (Kraken2 pipeline)

host-bam.title: Host BAM file
host-bam.description: BAM file generated from mapping filtered input reads to the host reference.

host-bai.title: BAM index file of host reads
host-bai.description: BAM index file generated from mapping filtered input reads to the host reference.

minimap2-bam.title: BAM file (minimap2)
minimap2-bam.description: BAM file generated from mapping filtered input reads to the reference.

minimap2-index.title: BAM index file (minimap2)
minimap2-index.description: Index file generated from mapping filtered input reads to the reference.

amr-report.title: JSON file with identified AMR genes (amr)
amr-report.description: JSON file with abricate results. More info about [abricate output](https://github.com/tseemann/abricate#output).

reduced-reference.title: Reduced reference FASTA file
reduced-reference.description: Reference FASTA file containing only those sequences that have reads mapped against them.

reduced-reference-index.title: Index of the reduced reference FASTA file
reduced-reference-index.description: Index of the reference FASTA file containing only those sequences that have reads mapped against them.

reduced-reference-gzi-index.title: GZI index of the reduced reference FASTA file
reduced-reference-gzi-index.description: Index of the reference FASTA file containing only those sequences that have reads mapped against them.

igv-config.title: JSON configuration file for IGV browser
igv-config.description: JSON configuration file to be loaded in IGV for visualising alignments against the reduced reference.

kraken-read-assignments.title: Taxonomic assignment per read from kraken2.
kraken-read-assignments.description: TSV file with the taxonomic assignment classified by kraken2 (no identity or coverage filters are applied).

minimap-read-assignments.title: Taxonomic assignment per read from minimap2.
minimap-read-assignments.description: TSV file with the taxonomic assignment per read after identity and coverage filters.

extracted-fastq.title: FASTQ of the selected taxids.
extracted-fastq.description: FASTQ containing/excluding the reads of the selected taxids.

unclassified-fastq.title: FASTQ of the unclassified reads.
unclassified-fastq.description: FASTQ containing the reads that have not been classified against the database.

alignment-table.title: TSV with some alignment statistics
alignment-table.description: Coverage and taxonomy of each reference.
